title: Direct Put-Away to Optimal Bin
description: After receiving an item, the WMS must direct the operator to the best possible storage bin, considering space, item type, and existing stock.

tasks.description: An operator scans a newly received item.
The system analyzes put-away rules: first, it looks for an existing pick face for that item with available capacity.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system checks for a primary location to top-off.

tasks.description: Finding no room in the pick face, the system then finds the closest available bulk storage location that can fit the pallet.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system suggests an optimal bulk storage bin.

tasks.description: The system creates a put-away task directing the operator to the suggested location.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator receives a clear instruction for where to store the item.
